list.name: Failed commit: Default (2)
list.comment: Changed package from debut to savant

changelist.name: Failed commit: Default (2)
changelist.comment: Changed package from debut to savant

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Bug fix for missing coverage file message.

MESSAGE.value: Track progress of formatting file and allow cancellation via interruption of thread.
Re-usable BAMParametersDialog. Get parameters only in one place.
Use ceiling of unitWidth to avoid white spaces in sequence rendering at lower resolutions.
Fixed problem with accelerator keys being disabled after showing Format dialog.
Fixed zooming on Mac.
Fixed copyright notice.
Made getInstance() methods synchronized.
Added FLOAT type.
Moved from tools package.
Added MESSAGE instruction.
Use range to determine sampling frequency instead of resolution. Required hack to accommodate coverage.
Made guessSequence a static method because others need it.
Include reading and writing of FLOAT.
Made BAM coverage formatting cancellable and it shows progress.
Moved from tools package. Now creates a directory of coverage files, one for each reference sequence in the BAM file.
Small tweaks.
Contains a hack to accommodate coverage by displaying a message when no coverage track is available.
Make sure enabled status is set properly. Hack to accommodate coverage by displaying a message when no track is available.
More hackage to create() to load proper coverage file for BAM track.
Made getInstance() synchronized. Moved initialization of plugins out of constructor. Display dialogs on success/failure of formatting.
Switch to floats instead of doubles.
Changed from doubles to floats.
Changed continuous format from doubles to floats.
Show message dialog after formatting (successful or not.)
Bug fix for missing coverage file message.
